ith a swipe of his energon flame sword he sends the Sweep hurtling down whe=

k. Grimlock then transforms back to T-Rex mode and unleashes his flame brea=

Swiftly the dark cloud of sweeps moved foward, leaping through the skies=

ers and attackers that lay there. 

> Hydras screamed and said "ATTACK THE =
INTRUDERS!!! !!"

 opened fire
The fortrerss's canons ripped into the onslaught of sweeps, th=
e multiple explosions that can be seen from the ground clear indication of =
the effectiveness and accuracy of the attacks. However the success is short=
 lived as the group seems to seperate and swing out, like a school of fish,=
 agile and swift to avoid the remainder of the attack. 
Dividing almost in =
half they swing to the sides of the base, attempting to catch the base and =
the bots with it in some pincer movement. As they get closer myriads of red=
 dots bath the ground and individual people, as they search for victims. Th=
en with a disturbing singularity of purpose they open fire on the inhabitan=
ts below, Decepticon or Predicon, Maximal or Autobot, all seem to be fair g=
ame for these slayers as they rain death and destruction down on the base a=
nd the enviorns!

<table cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0' border='0' ><tr><td valign='top' style='font: inherit;'><P>::Grimlock::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Grimlock transforms to robot mode as a Sweep comes near. With a swipe of his energon flame sword he sends the Sweep hurtling down where it changes to bot mode. It tries to get up but is kicked down by Grimlock. Grimlock then transforms back to T-Rex mode and unleashes his flame breath on the Sweep. He then crushes the scortched Sweep in his jaws.<BR></P>
<P>Grimlock: Lord Perseus, me Grimlock think we outnumbered. Need to retreat.</P>
<P><BR>--- On <B>Wed, 6/18/08, Super Cyclonus <I><supercyclonus@...></I></B> wrote:<BR></P>
<BLOCKQUOTE style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: rgb(16,16,255) 2px solid">From: Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...><BR>Subject: Re: Minions over the Black Fortress<BR>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com<BR>Date: Wednesday, June 18, 2008, 5:05 PM<BR><BR>
<DIV id=yiv1706201773>
<DIV id=ygrp-text>
<P>Swiftly the dark cloud of sweeps moved foward, leaping through the skies like some dark wave, reaching out toward the Blcak Fortress and the defenders and attackers that lay there. <BR><BR>> Hydras screamed and said "ATTACK THE INTRUDERS!!! !!"<BR>><BR>> The Blackfortress autodefences aimed the indruders and opened fire<BR>The fortrerss's canons ripped into the onslaught of sweeps, the multiple explosions that can be seen from the ground clear indication of the effectiveness and accuracy of the attacks. However the success is short lived as the group seems to seperate and swing out, like a school of fish, agile and swift to avoid the remainder of the attack. <BR>Dividing almost in half they swing to the sides of the base, attempting to catch the base and the bots with it in some pincer movement. As they get closer myriads of red dots bath the ground and individual people, as they search for victims. Then with a disturbing singularity of
 purpose they open fire on the inhabitants below, Decepticon or Predicon, Maximal or Autobot, all seem to be fair game for these slayers as they rain death and destruction down on the base and the enviorns!<BR>(Tag everyone around the Black Fortress)<BR>Preston <BR>(Da'minion)<BR><BR></P></DIV></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></td></tr></table><br>
